description: Customer aging report providing outstanding balances and overdue payments for customers. Includes country, account manager, and salesperson details. Tracks aging categories from current to above 360 days, along with customer payment history and open invoices.

columns.name: Country_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the country.

columns.name: Country
columns.description: Name of the country associated with the customer.

columns.name: AccountManager_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the account manager.

columns.name: AccountManager_Name
columns.description: Name of the account manager responsible for the customer.

columns.name: Customer No
columns.description: Unique customer number assigned to the account.

columns.name: Customer
columns.description: Customer name or company name.

columns.name: Balance Outstanding
columns.description: Total outstanding balance due from the customer.

columns.name: Future
columns.description: Future-dated outstanding payments.

columns.name: 0 - 30 Aging
columns.description: Amount overdue within 0-30 days.

columns.name: 31 - 60 Aging
columns.description: Amount overdue within 31-60 days.

columns.name: 61 - 90 Aging
columns.description: Amount overdue within 61-90 days.

columns.name: 91 - 120 Aging
columns.description: Amount overdue within 91-120 days.

columns.name: 121 - 180 Aging
columns.description: Amount overdue within 121-180 days.

columns.name: 181 - 360 Aging
columns.description: Amount overdue within 181-360 days.

columns.name: Above 361 Aging
columns.description: Amount overdue for more than 361 days.

columns.name: DueDate
columns.description: Date when payment is due.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Total invoice amount.

columns.name: CustomerRemaining
columns.description: Remaining balance to be paid by the customer.

columns.name: DocumentType
columns.description: Type of financial document (e.g., invoice, credit note).

columns.name: AgingBackward
columns.description: Backward aging analysis category.

columns.name: AgingForward
columns.description: Forward aging analysis category.

columns.name: Document_No
columns.description: Unique document number.

columns.name: Product
columns.description: Product or service associated with the transaction.

columns.name: Agreement_Type_Filter
columns.description: Filter for agreement types related to customer transactions.

columns.name: CustomerCollectionStatus
columns.description: Current status of the customer's collection process.

columns.name: %GT Customer Remaining
columns.description: Percentage of the total outstanding balance that remains unpaid.

columns.name: LastPaymentDate
columns.description: Date of the customer's last payment.

columns.name: LastPaymentAmountUSD
columns.description: Amount of the last payment made by the customer in USD.

columns.name: SalesPersonID
columns.description: Unique identifier of the salesperson associated with the transaction.

columns.name: SalesPerson_Name
columns.description: Name of the salesperson handling the customer.

columns.name: Nbr of Open Invoices
columns.description: Number of outstanding invoices for the customer.
